content: {"locationId": "11981", "organizationId": "9387", "name": "GAP Food Ministry of the WELL COMMUNITY FELLOWSHIP", "address1": "2500 Claus Rd", "address2": "", "city": "Modesto", "state": "CA", "zipCode": "95355", "country": null, "phone": "209-551-4463", "phoneExt": "1", "website": null, "latitude": "37.67698", "longitude": "-120.92095", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Stanislaus", "languages": "English, Other, Spanish", "features": "Near Public Transit", "aboutUs": "GAP Food Ministry:  The GAP Ministry team recognizes that God has called each of us to be a blessing to the people in Stanislaus County, who struggle with food insecurity. GAP Food Ministry serves as the hands & feet of Christ to provide good, quality foods to the hungry. God has blessed GAP volunteers with love, compassion & the desire to reach out to those in need. SGAP groceries are shared with love & respect to those who come for assistance, it is given freely without judgement or condemnation. It is our intention that our SGAP, TEFAP, EFB & FIGS clients receive not only groceries for their physical hunger, but also kindness & grace to feed their spiritual and emotional hunger.  \" For I was hungry and you fed me, I was thirsty and you gave me water, I was a stranger and you invited me into your home. \"                                                                                                                                                                                      Matthew 25:35", "notes": "", "contactName": "GAP Food Ministry", "contactPhone": "209-551-4463", "contactEmail": "kkeye@thewellmodesto.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Grocery / Client Choice, Other, Outdoor Service, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "Other", "foodOfferings": "Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Other, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 74, "regionName": "Second Harvest of the Greater Valley", "logoBlobNameSmall": "45c6d893-8eb4-472c-86d9-508a06fef76e.png", "website": "https://localfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Pacific Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "PT", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Sunday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (GAP business office CLOSED)", "Sunday 8:30 AM-9:30 AM (TEFAP Food distribution)", "Monday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (GAP business office CLOSED)", "Tuesday 10:00 AM-2:00 PM (GAP business office hours.
